sell as many as 534,000 shares of the company's stock over the next year. At current prices, those shares are worth roughly$ 334 million. The filing says Eric Schmidt is selling the stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity. Eric Schmidt has sold Google stock before, notably after the company's initial public offering in 2004 when he sold shares worth roughly$ 258 million. President Bush at a Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the UN two days later. Donald Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting: We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. Colin Powell objected. In his UN presentation, Colin Powell described it as ''Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal.'' Donald Rumsfeld said Khurmal

the realignment atop the company's Server and Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. Steve Ballmer effectively fired Muglia from the post
